pages.text: Even without guns, we can find ways to strike zombies from a distance. After all, half of human civilization is about throwing stones far and true, isn't it? A wrench is a great tool, aside from helping you disassemble and maintain many devices. With the right length and a fine balance, a little training can turn it into an
excellent Native American tomahawk. It's time to embark on a primal hunt against the zombies, hoping they won't feel it, because it really hurts!
